string-array.name: developer_imageslider
string-array.item:
There are three members in our team.
 1. Samiksha Kumari (Lead Role) 
 2. Karan Kr. Singh 
 3. Burhanuddin Bawer

Our main purpose for making this app to give the summary of full news.
we have used here "Text-Summarization Algorithm".
We have made more than 20 apps.However we have only 3 apps in Google play store including this one.
Our team have strong compatability in UI/UX designs ,coding and wireframing.
